properties.areaDesc: Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM; Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 7 at 9:20PM AST until February 9 at 8:00AM AST by NWS San Juan PR
properties.description:
...ROUGH AND HAZARDOUS MARINE CONDITIONS WILL PREVAIL THROUGH THE
WEEKEND...

.A strong surface high pressure across the central Atlantic will
yield a fresh to locally strong easterly wind flow across the
regional waters, creating choppy and hazardous marine conditions
through the weekend.

* WHAT...Seas between 5 to 7 feet with occasional seas up to 9
feet and easterly winds at 20 kt. Winds across the Caribbean
offshore waters are ranging between 20 and 25 kt with higher
gusts.

* WHERE...Coastal Waters of Northern Puerto Rico out 10 NM and
Coastal Waters of Southern Puerto Rico out 10 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 AM Saturday to 8 AM AST Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM SATURDAY TO 8 AM AST SUNDAY
